author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Addresses issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/29983, which is likely caused by integration of PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/29622. 
I address the issue in a similar fashion as done PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/28842 which was fixing issue #28837.

#### PR validation:

Tested successfully unit tests in `CMSSW_11_2_X_2020-05-26-1100` in and `CMSSW_11_2_PY3_X_2020-05-25-2300`

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not a backport.
title: [Py3] fix unit tests in CondCore
